title: Ep 392 | Jase Explains Why Jesus Is the Ultimate Transformer & the Amazing Experience Heaven Will Be
description:
Jase finally realizes Al’s contribution to the podcast. Phil shares his opinion on Matthew 22 and how Jesus was able to change the crowd's perception of himself. Jase and Phil discuss the afterlife and the details that will need to be worked out. Zach gives a picture of what we will be doing in heaven. Phil and Jase explain that Jesus is not the God of the dead, but the God of the living. And Jase shows why we should not dwell on many of the small issues, but rather focus on simply getting to heaven.
